declare @systemmessage nvarchar(max) set @systemmessage = 'TEST' declare @focusid int set @focusid = ISNULL((select SettingValue as focusarticleid from RSEUserSettings where CreatedByUserID = '[UserID,System]' and PortalID = '[PortalID,System]' and Settingname = N'focusarticleid'),'-1') declare @ParentID int set @ParentID = (select TOP 1 ParentID from [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticle where [DS_ID] = @focusid) if @ParentID = '-1' BEGIN set @systemmessage = 'parentid -1' goto endsave END declare @childcount int if @ParentID = 0 BEGIN set @childcount = (select count(DS_ID) from [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticle where [ParentID] = @focusid and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0 ) if @childcount > 0 BEGIN set @systemmessage = 'cannot delete, please delete translations first' goto endsave END ELSE GOTO DS_UPDATE END DS_UPDATE: BEGIN UPDATE [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticle] SET [changeDateTime] = GETDATE() ,[ipaddress] = '[Request.UserHostAddress,system]' ,[userDeleted] = '1' ,[IsActive] = '0' ,[PortalID] = '[PortalID,System]' ,[LastUserID] = '[UserID,System]' WHERE [DS_ID] = @focusid delete from [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticleToModule where ModuleID = '[ModuleID,System]' and PortalID = '[PortalID,System]' insert into [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticleToModule (UserID, ArticleID, ModuleID,IPAddress, PortalID) values('[UserID,System]', @ParentID , '[ModuleID,System]','[Request.UserHostAddress,system]', '[PortalID,System]') set @systemmessage = 'record deleted!' select @systemmessage as systemmessage, @focusid as focusid execute [dbo].[RSEprocSetModuleSettings] @UserID='[UserID,System]', @PortalID='[PortalID,System]', @SettingName='FocusArticleID', @SettingValue=@ParentID goto endsave END endsave: select @systemmessage as systemmessage, '0' as focusid END","IsProcess":"false","Connection":"","CacheName":"","CacheTime":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Execute","ChildActions":[{"Index":34,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Type":"Detail-NoQuery","GroupStatement":"","GroupIndex":"","Value":"","Connection":"","Filter":"","CacheTime":"","CacheName":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Template","ChildActions":[]}]}]},{"Index":35,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"LeftCondition":"'[Action,Querystring]'","RightCondition":"'save'","Operator":"=","IsAdvanced":"False"},"ActionType":"Condition-ElseIf","ChildActions":[{"Index":36,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Name":"CompanyVariables","RenderType":"2","skipDebug":"false","includeSearch":"false","includeExport":"false","includeImport":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Region","ChildActions":[{"Index":37,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"VariableType":"

declare @systemmessage nvarchar(max) IF [UserID,System] = '-1' or [UserID,System] = NULL goto endsave declare @focusid int set @focusid = ISNULL((select SettingValue as focusarticleid from RSEUserSettings where CreatedByUserID = [UserID,System] and PortalID = [PortalID,System] and Settingname = N'focusarticleid'),'-1') UPDATE [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticle] SET [changeDateTime] = GETDATE() ,[ipaddress] = '[Request.UserHostAddress,system]' ,[IsActive] = @frmIsActive ,[BaseName] = @frmBaseName ,[BaseDescription] = @frmBaseDescription ,[PortalID] = '[PortalID,System]' ,[LastUserID] = '[UserID,System]' WHERE [DS_ID] = @focusid set @systemmessage = 'Article "'+@frmBaseName+'" saved.' select @systemmessage as systemmessage, @focusid as focusid endsave: END","IsProcess":"false","Connection":"","CacheName":"","CacheTime":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Execute","ChildActions":[{"Index":41,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Type":"Detail-NoQuery","GroupStatement":"","GroupIndex":"","Value":"","Connection":"","Filter":"","CacheTime":"","CacheName":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Template","ChildActions":[]}]}]},{"Index":42,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"LeftCondition":"'[Action,Querystring]'","RightCondition":"'new'","Operator":"=","IsAdvanced":"False"},"ActionType":"Condition-ElseIf","ChildActions":[{"Index":43,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Name":"SAVE","Query":"declare @articleid int IF [UserID,System] = '-1' or [UserID,System] = NULL goto endsave INSERT INTO [|@FocusDB,variable][RSEArticle] ( UserID, IPAddress, PortalID, [language] ) VALUES( '[UserID,System]', '[Request.UserHostAddress,system]', '[PortalID,System]', '[MasterLanguage,QueryFocusID]' ) set @articleid = @@Identity --UPDATE RSEshopUser set [focusarticleid] = @articleid where userid = [UserID,System] execute [dbo].[RSEprocSetModuleSettings] @UserID='[UserID,System]', @PortalID='[PortalID,System]', @SettingName='FocusArticleID', @SettingValue=@articleid UPDATE [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticle set orderparentID = @articleid where ds_id = @articleid BEGIN declare @focusid int set @focusid = @articleid delete from [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticleToModule where ModuleID = [ModuleID,System] and PortalID = '[PortalID,System]' insert into [|@FocusDB,variable]RSEArticleToModule (UserID, ArticleID, ModuleID,IPAddress, PortalID) values([UserID,System], @focusid, '[ModuleID,System]','[Request.UserHostAddress,system]', '[PortalID,System]') endsave: END Select @articleid noteid","IsProcess":"false","Connection":"","CacheName":"","CacheTime":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Execute","ChildActions":[]}]},{"Index":44,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"LeftCondition":"'[Action,Querystring]'","RightCondition":"'newtranslation'","Operator":"=","IsAdvanced":"False"},"ActionType":"Condition-ElseIf","ChildActions":[{"Index":45,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"VariableType":"","VariableDataType":"Any","Formatters":"","QuerySource":"frmNewLanguage","QueryTarget":"@NewLanguage","QueryTargetLeft":"'","QueryTargetRight":"'","QueryTargetEmpty":"NULL","EscapeListX":"0","Protected":"true","EscapeHTML":"true"},"ActionType":"Template-Variable","ChildActions":[]},{"Index":46,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Name":"SAVE","Query":"declare @ParentID int declare @ItemID int set @ItemID = [FocusArticleID,QueryFocusID] declare @returnmessage nvarchar(500) set @returnmessage = 'ein entsprechender Datensatz ist bereits vorhanden' set @ParentID = (select TOP 1 ParentID from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle where [DS_ID] = @ItemID) declare @temptable table(SourceID int, IDspalte int identity(1,1)) -- if focus = master if @parentid = 0 BEGIN --aktueller DS insert into @temptable (SourceID) values(@ItemID) set @parentid = @ItemID --suche alle verbundenen Sprachen insert into @temptable (SourceID) (select [DS_ID] from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle where [ParentID] = @ParentID and [DS_ID] not in (select SourceID from @temptable) and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0 ) END ELSE BEGIN -- if focus = slave insert into @temptable (SourceID) values(@ParentID) --suche alle verbundenen Sprachen insert into @temptable (SourceID) (select [DS_ID] from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle where [ParentID] = @ParentID and [DS_ID] not in (select SourceID from @temptable) and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0 ) END if @NewLanguage in (select language from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle where [DS_ID] in (select SourceID from @temptable) and language = @NewLanguage) goto endsave ELSE -- neuer Datensatz BEGIN INSERT INTO [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle (UserID, IPAddress, PortalID, ParentID,language) Values ('[UserID,System]','[Request.UserHostAddress,system]','[PortalID,System]',@ParentID ,@NewLanguage) Select @@Identity as noteid,@@Identity as FocusArticleID execute [dbo].[RSEprocSetModuleSettings] @UserID='[UserID,System]', @PortalID='[PortalID,System]', @SettingName='FocusArticleID', @SettingValue=@@Identity --UPDATE RSEshopUser set [focusarticleid] = @@Identity where userid = [UserID,System] UPDATE [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle set orderparentID = @@Identity where [DS_ID] = @@Identity END --set @returnmessage = 'eine Übersetzung in der Sprache' +@NewLanguage +' wurde engelegt.' endsave: --select @returnmessage as returnmessage","IsProcess":"false","Connection":"","CacheName":"","CacheTime":"","CacheShared":"false"},"ActionType":"Action-Execute","ChildActions":[]}]},{"Index":47,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"LeftCondition":"'[Action,Querystring]'","RightCondition":"'edit'","Operator":"=","IsAdvanced":"False"},"ActionType":"Condition-ElseIf","ChildActions":[{"Index":48,"Level":0,"Parameters":{"Type":"Query-Query","GroupStatement":"","GroupIndex":"","Value":"declare PortalID = '[PortalID,System]' and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0) if 1 = (select case when @articleID in ( select DS_ID from [externDB,QueryFocusID]RSEArticle where PortalID = [PortalID,System] and userDeleted = 0 and sysDeleted = 0) then 1 else 0 end) BEGIN set @articleID = '[FocusArticleID,QueryFocusID]' END else BEGIN set @articleID = @ParentID END SELECT * FROM [externDB,QueryFocusID][RSEArticle] where DS_ID =
